mapper.select: select M.*, P.* from MEMBERS M left join POINT P ON M.MEM_NUM = P.MEM_NUM where M.MEM_ID = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET MEM_NAME = #{MEM_NAME}, MEM_PASS = #{MEM_PASS}, MEM_GENDER = #{MEM_GENDER}, MEM_PHONE = #{MEM_PHONE}, MEM_EMAIL = #{MEM_EMAIL} WHERE MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID}
update MEMBERS set MEM_STATUS = '탈퇴유예', MEM_RESPITE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, MEM_OUT = DATE_ADD(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INTERVAL 6 MONTH) where MEM_ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT TP.TP_NUM, TP.TP_PRICE, TP.TP_SEAT, TP.TP_TYPE, TP.TP_PAYMENT, TP.TP_TIME, M.MEM_ID, S.SC_TIME, S.SC_TIME_END, T.TH_NAME, T.TH_REGION, T.TH_NUMBER, MV.title FROM TICKETPAYMENT TP JOIN MEMBERS M ON TP.MEM_NUM = M.MEM_NUM JOIN SCREEN S ON TP.SC_NUM = S.SC_NUM JOIN CINEMA C ON S.CI_NUM = C.CI_NUM JOIN THEATER T ON C.TH_NUM = T.TH_NUM JOIN MOVIE MV ON C.MOVIE_NUM = MV.MOVIE_NUM WHERE TP.TP_NUM = #{tp_NUM}
SELECT MEM_NUM FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEM_ID = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TICKETPAYMENT TP JOIN MEMBERS M ON TP.MEM_NUM = M.MEM_NUM JOIN SCREEN S ON TP.SC_NUM = S.SC_NUM JOIN CINEMA C ON S.CI_NUM = C.CI_NUM JOIN THEATER T ON C.TH_NUM = T.TH_NUM JOIN MOVIE MV ON C.MOVIE_NUM = MV.MOVIE_NUM WHERE M.MEM_NUM = #{memberNum}
AND ( TP.TP_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pageDTO.search}, '%') OR S.SC_TIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pageDTO.search}, '%') OR T.TH_REGION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pageDTO.search}, '%') OR T.TH_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pageDTO.search}, '%') OR T.TH_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pageDTO.search}, '%') OR MV.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pageDTO.search}, '%') )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STOREPAYMENT SP JOIN STORE S ON SP.ST_NUM = S.ST_NUM JOIN MEMBERS M ON SP.MEM_NUM = M.MEM_NUM WHERE M.MEM_ID = #{memberId}
AND ( SP.SP_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pageDTO.search}, '%') OR SP.PRODUCT_TOTAL_PRICE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pageDTO.search}, '%') OR SP.PAYMENT_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pageDTO.search}, '%') OR S.ST_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pageDTO.search}, '%') OR S.ST_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pageDTO.search}, '%') OR S.ST_CONST LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pageDTO.search}, '%') )

SELECT SP.SP_NUM, SP.PRODUCT_TOTAL_PRICE, SP.PAYMENT_DATE, S.ST_NAME, S.ST_TYPE, S.ST_CONST FROM STOREPAYMENT SP JOIN STORE S ON SP.ST_NUM = S.ST_NUM JOIN MEMBERS M ON SP.MEM_NUM = M.MEM_NUM WHERE SP.SP_NUM = #{sp_num}
